2.「あとは 何をするんだ？| 海底探索に 行きたそうな顔をしてるな？|<selec: What else are you gonna do? You look like you|want to go exploring the ocean floor.|<select_se_off>|Going to explore the ocean floor|See the rewards|View Rankings|Listen to the explanation|View the rules|<select_end><break>

3.「私は ガテリア号に乗って| 海底探索を まだまだ続けていこうと思う。| 時間が: I will continue my exploration of the ocean|floor aboard the Gateria... If you have time,|I'd appreciate your help!<end>

4.「いいぞー！| ガテリア号に乗りこんで| 海底探索へ 出発するのだな？|<yes: Great! We're going to board the Gateria and|set off to explore the ocean floor, aren't|we?<yesno><break>

5.「ときは来た！| さあ 海底探索に出発だ！|<end>: The time has come! Let's go explore the ocean|floor!<end>

6.「え やめるのか……？ うそだろ……？| ほんとうに やめちゃうのか……？| 気: What? You're quitting? No way...? Are you|really going to stop...? I hope you'll come|back when you feel like it...<end>

7.「ときが来たら ガテリア号に乗って| また海底探索に 行こうと思う。| そのとき: When the time comes, we'll board the Gateria|and go exploring the ocean floor again. When|the time comes, I'll need your help!<end>

8.「今回の海底探索は もう充分にできた。| また次の機会に 協力を よろしく頼む！: I've had enough of this underwater|exploration. Next time, we'll need your help!<bw_break>

16.「みなで協力して 船体の修理に必要な| パーツを集める。時間内に全てのパーツを|:
We'll work together to get the parts needed|to repair the hull. If we can deliver all the|parts in time, we can move on to... Next, the|
|engine. We'll have all the parts we need for|the engine within the time limit. Once the|hull and engine repairs are complete, the|
|Gateria will be ready to go! Finally, we must|load as much treasure as we can from the|ocean floor! You can get on board through the|
|ladder on the Gateria... Don't get so blinded|by the treasure that you can't make it to the|ship in time!

17.「ガテリア号の 修理に必要なパーツは| ねじ 電池 歯車の 三種類。| これらを:
The parts we need to repair the Gateria are|screws, batteries, gears... All of these|parts must be collected and delivered to one|
|location. Each part has its own storage zone,|so I'll collect the parts I've collected...|The icons above my head tell me which parts|
|I'm in charge of. I can't collect parts that|I'm not in charge of. But once you've|collected all the parts you're assigned to,|
|you'll be able to collect any part you want!|The crew in the white suits can't pick up|parts. But they move fast, so your mission is|
|to use your ale to restore energy to your|companions. Save your friends who need help!

18.「次に 注意事項を伝える。 海底には| 恐ろしい生き物が たくさんいる……。|<:
Now, a word of caution... There are many|terrifying creatures on the ocean floor. The|one we need to watch out for the most is the|
|Abyssal Shark! If one of these bites you,|you'll be blown near the Gateria, and any|parts you're carrying will be dropped right|
|where it bites you! Be careful of the Numb|Lizard... If you touch it, you'll be|paralyzed for a while, and your parts will be|
|swept away. If you're near either of them,|the screen will turn yellow as a warning, so|watch your surroundings! You can also use the|
|stun zone to get rid of them.

19.「ダイバースーツの スキルについて| 説明するぞ。|<br>|「ひとつめは エー:
Diver suit skills, explained... The first|is... You can use it on a fallen comrade. If|you use it on a fallen comrade, it can even|
|wake them up, making it a powerful skill that|can be used over and over again! However...|But you can't ale yourself, and you can't ale|
|yourself if you have parts. You'll have to|think very carefully about whether or not you|want to get the parts. Secondly, Stun... The|
|second is a stun... which creates a powerful|electrical current around you... to ward off|dangerous creatures. Unfortunately, as|
|powerful as the effect is, it only fires one|shot per stun shell. Use it when the time is|right! Picking up more than one stun shell|
|won't increase the number of times you can|use it, so it's best to leave some for your|friends.

20.「協力してくれたお礼として| 私から トータルスコアに応じた| 報酬をわたそう！:
As a thank you for your help, I'll give you a|reward based on your total score! To see what|you'll get, go to "View Rewards"... I hope|
|you'll try your best to complete it!

21.「フレンドとチームメンバーの| ハイスコアの ランキングを| 見ることができるぞ: You can see the high score rankings of your|friends and team members... Try as many times|as you can to get a higher score!<bw_break>

22.「おお！ よくがんばってくれた！| 報酬を渡すぞ！|<bw_break>: Oh! You've done well! I'll give you your|reward!<bw_break>

32.「ダイバースーツには エナジーがある。| エナジーゲージで 残りが確認できる。|:
The diver's suit has an energy gauge... An|energy gauge will tell you how much energy|you have left. As you turn over parts, your|
|energy level will decrease. When it reaches|zero, your diver suit will pause and you'll|be stuck in there until it restarts.

33.「海底には 様々なアイテムが| 流れてくることがあるぞ。|<br>|「まず スタ:
There are a number of items that can be|washed up on the ocean floor. First, there's|the stun zone. Next, a survival bot that|
|increases everyone's movement speed and|restores all of their energies. Finally, a|score-jug that increases your voyage score.|
|If you see one, don't miss it!|
